channel.title: Circle mouse
channel.description: this is my first script. i made it by taking an idea from one of Kane's scripts, so i only takes partial credit for it. all it does is move the mouse in a slightly jagged circle. :P[code]Program circlemouse; //select the desktop with the crosshairs. begin repeat movemousesmooth(202,202); wait(50) movemousesmooth(204,200); wait(50) movemousesmooth(206,198); wait(50) movemousesmooth(204,196); wait(50) movemousesmooth(202,194); wait(50) movemousesmooth(200,192); wait(50) movemousesmooth(198,190); wait(50) movemousesmooth(196,192); wait(50) movemousesmooth(194,194); wait(50) movemousesmooth(196,196); wait(50) movemousesmooth(198,198); wait(50) movemousesmooth(200,200); wait(50) movemousesmooth(202,202); wait(50) until(isFkeydown(10)); end.[/code] just hit F10 to kill the script.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 30, 2006, 07:52:18 PM[/size][hr]here is another script by Kane, modified by me. the previous one was just the same idea. this is adding onto his script.[code]var Clear:Integer; Const WA=200;//Wait Begin For Clear:=0 To 32 Do Writeln('') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yay!') Writeln(' /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yay! Lol.') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yay! Lol.') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yay! Lol.') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yay! Lol.') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(500) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yay! Lol.') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yay! Lol.') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') writeln('') For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yay! Lol.') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') writeln('') Wait(300) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yay! Lol.') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' WE ROCK!') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' WE ROCK!') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' WE ROCK!') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(500) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' WE ROCK!') Writeln(' / /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(WA) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' Yup') Writeln(' /') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(1000) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln(' ') Writeln(' ') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(1000) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln('UHH. ') Writeln(' / ') Writeln(' O O') Writeln('\|/ \|/') Writeln(' | | ') Writeln('/ \ / \') Wait(1000) For Clear:=0 To 32 Do writeln('') Writeln('UHH. @gokon wrote:

this is my first script. i made it by taking an idea from one of Kane’s scripts, so i only takes partial credit for it. all it does is move the mouse in a slightly jagged circle. Program circlemouse; //select the desktop with the crosshairs. begin repeat movemousesmooth(202,202); wait(50) movemousesmooth(204,200); wait(50) movemousesmooth(206,198); wait(50) movemousesmooth(204,196); wait(50) movemousesmooth(202,194); wait(50) movemousesmooth(200,192); wait(50) movemousesmooth(198,190); wait(50) movemousesmooth(196,192); wait(50) movemousesmooth(194,194); wait(50) movemousesmooth(196,196); wait(50) movemousesmooth(198,198); wait(50) movemousesmooth(200,200); wait(50) movemousesmooth(202,202); wait(50) until(isFkeydown(10)); end.
